thread.title: New York sues Harvey Weinstein, threatening studio sale

title: New York sues Harvey Weinstein, threatening studio sale
text:
New York sues Harvey Weinstein, threatening studio sale Monday, February 12, 2018 - 01:43 
New York’s attorney general sued the Weinstein Company and Harvey Weinstein on Sunday alleging years of sexual harassment and misconduct by the movie producer, in a move that could jeopardize talks on a potential sale of the studio.   
New York’s attorney general sued the Weinstein Company and Harvey Weinstein on Sunday alleging years of sexual harassment and misconduct by the movie producer, in a move that could jeopardize talks on a potential sale of the studio.  //reut.rs/2EEfW7H
